name: COKUNST Electric Wine Opener, Battery Operated Wine Bottle Openers with Foil Cutter, One-click Button Corkscrew Remover for Home Kitchen Party Wedding
about_this_item: [Powerful & Durable]: The electric wine opener is with a powerful and fast cork removal function that can open up many wine bottles at one time. 4 AA batteries required (no batteries included)

[Easy to Use]: Peel, Pop & Push---Only 3 steps to remove the cork in seconds. The transparent shell is easy to observe when pulling the cork out. The removable foil cutter is convenient to clean the wine opener

[Full-Automatic]: This electric wine opener features an ergonomic grip for easy handling designed to fit all traditional wine bottles, just click button and the cork remove automatically with true hands free

[Sleek Design & Portable ]: Our wine remover features the smooth surface with good hand feeling. There is blue led indicator light when the cork being drawn up from the bottle. Small size will be more convenient to take it out and save space
[Use for Many Occasion ]: A great design concept that can save your time and energy. A perfect gift for any occasion like home party, wedding, restaurant, bar or outdoors party

title: Great price

post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: My son and I had been talking about how much difficulty we each have in being able to open bottles of wine that have a cork. We each have regular corkscrews but couldn't quite get the hang of it without the cork breaking. In my case, I don't have the finger/hand strength to pull the cork out the regular way. Then, I saw this electric wine opener. I looked at others too but this one seemed to be the easiest one to use. So, I bought one of each of us as Christmas gifts. I have already used mine to open some wine that I needed while making Coq au Vin and it was a breeze. The directions are easy to follow and it was easy to install the batteries. I especially like have the foil top cutter at the top of the opener that you can pull off, place it around the top, turn it one full circle, and the foil top lifts right off. It couldn't be easier and I had my wine open in no time. I plan to buy more as gifts for my friends and family members too. This is definitely one of the best buys of my Christmas season and probably the gift that I will use the most.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024

title: The function of this tool
content: It Works!!  I was skeptical of it being powerful enough with the battery power of 4 AA batteries, but it does a wonderful job.  Cutting the paper off of the bottle is a manual action but the corkscrew opens bottles with ease.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Obviously a "knock off " product, but this works well.  Have opened a case of wine so far on the first set of AA batteries.  They have a rechargeable model but we don't have outlet space for yet another charger.  The foil cutter is why I got this, was shopping for a foil cutter and found this with cutter for maybe twice the price of a two pack of foil cutters.  This also conveniently stores the foil cutter so it is there when you need it.  Only complaint is that it would be better if the cutter was stored on the top instead of being on the bottom blocking the corkscrew for when  you don't need to cut the foil.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2024

title: Wow... it really works
content: So, I should mention that I an a beverage professional (seriously I work for a Spirits and wine producer). I open a lot of wine for work and really love my traditional double step wine key. I saw this and thought it was going to be a cool novelty especially at the price point. BUT, I was surprised. This thing is the real thing and does a great job. I should point out that it is vital and important that you remove the foil first. I have seen so many people open wine the wrong way and it is bad... If you remove the foil completely that is even better. (no matter what you use to remove the cork). THe only test I have remaining is trying it out on a synthetic cork. If I do, I will report back and update this review. Either way, this really is a great product and works exactly as it should (if you do it the right way). So if you read others and they complain about this then they have no idea how it works... I will be buying these for all my wine drinking friend for Christmas.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: Had an Oster for 10+ years that I broke so bought another same brand. Big mistake… the cork would always get stuck so returned that one  and read a review from someone else that did what I believe to be the same thing and they highly recommended this one. And boy were they right. This one is quite, fast and smooth as melted butter. Try it and you will know exactly what I am talking about. Oh and buy extras…. Perfect for gifts and you will want a couple stored away just in case you break the one you have, you will definitely want to replace it with the same one. Speaking from experience!
